class_notes:
(Same as BIOL 247LW 1)
This is the laboratory portion of the Ecology class. Field studies will be conducted in various natural areas in Georgia, including a weekend trip to the mountains. Pre- or corequisite: Biology/ENVS 247. (This course fulfills elective and upper-level laboratory credit for the biology major and the WR for the GERs.)  Prerequisites (for BIOL 247LW):  Biology 142 + 142L; Corequisite:  Biology/ENVS 247.)
course_description: This is the laboratory portion of the Ecology class. Field studies will be conducted in various natural areas in Georgia, including a weekend trip to the mountains. Pre- or corequisite: Biology/ENVS 247. (This course meets the upper-level laboratory requirement for the biology major and the WR GER.)
prerequisites: This course requires BIOL 142, BIOL 142L or BIOL_OX142 AND BIOL/ENVS 247 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
